title: Complete JavaScript Course
description: Master JavaScript from beginner to advanced with hands-on projects and real-world examples. Learn ES6+, async programming, DOM manipulation, and modern JavaScript frameworks.
instructorBio: 10+ years of experience in web development, specializing in JavaScript and React. Former Google engineer with a passion for teaching.

title: React Mastery Course
description: Build modern web applications with React. Learn hooks, context, routing, state management, and best practices for scalable React applications.
instructorBio: React core contributor and instructor with 8+ years of experience building enterprise React applications.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the principles of user interface and user experience design. Create beautiful, functional designs using industry-standard tools and methodologies.
instructorBio: Award-winning UX designer with experience at top tech companies. Specializes in user research and design systems.

title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
description: Master digital marketing strategies including SEO, social media marketing, email campaigns, and analytics. Build and execute successful marketing campaigns.
instructorBio: Digital marketing expert with 12+ years helping businesses grow online. Former marketing director at Fortune 500 companies.

title: Photography Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of photography including composition, lighting, camera settings, and post-processing. Perfect for beginners with any camera.
instructorBio: Award-winning photographer with 15+ years experience. Specializes in portrait and landscape photography.

title: Business Strategy and Planning
description: Develop comprehensive business strategies and create actionable plans for growth. Learn market analysis, competitive positioning, and strategic thinking.
instructorBio: MBA with 20+ years of consulting experience helping startups and enterprises develop winning strategies.

title: Python Programming for Beginners
description: Start your programming journey with Python. Learn syntax, data structures, algorithms, and build real projects from scratch.
instructorBio: Senior software engineer with expertise in Python and machine learning. Former instructor at coding bootcamps.

title: Music Production Fundamentals
description: Learn music production using modern DAWs. Cover recording, mixing, mastering, and music theory essentials for electronic and acoustic music.
instructorBio: Grammy-nominated producer with 10+ years in the industry. Worked with major artists and independent musicians.
